description: The initiative Coopérative Ariaf Kissane unites 21 farmers in a mountainous region to promote environmentally friendly agriculture amidst climate change challenges. Established around 2003-2004, the cooperative emphasizes agroecology, preserving endemic species, and safeguarding traditional seeds. It also engages in various activities, including artisanal crafts and beekeeping, to enhance sustainability. The cooperative aims to empower local farmers, ensuring they benefit from their own products while fostering community resilience and knowledge sharing.
name: Coopérative Ariaf Kissane
